thread.title: Peter Follert
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Peter Follert

author: Peter Follert
title: Peter Follert
text:
This is my first order which hasn't been delivered yet. I am, however, thankful that Prestige accepts Paypal which rendered the order process quick and painless. I have had no end of trouble with a credit card submission on my traditional florist site. Prices are competitive or better compared with my previously habitual site so that at this point it would seem logical to establish Prestige as my new floral partner. So far, so good. Thanks.
Sincerely, Peter
